timeline.bodyText: We should probably only fire this event once. Instead, we could store the values into fields annotated with Unique, and then access them from the ModifyVariable locations.
timeline.author: coderbot16

timeline.bodyText:

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Occurs when a player falls, but is able to fly.
          
          
            
             * Occurs when a player falls, but is able to fly.
          
          
            
             * {@link net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingFallEvent} will be fired for players that are not able to fly.

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be better to shadow abilities and just check it in the other mixin instead
timeline.author: coderbot16

timeline.message: Shadows abilities for one method instead of two.
Changes so onLivingFall is called once instead of twice
Clean up to be compliant with checkstyle
Removes the need for cancellable in hookHandleFallDamage

timeline.author: coderbot16

+ * + *

For players that are able to fly, {@link net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player.PlayerFlyableFallEvent} will be fired instead.
